roleset.name: cause increase in elevation
roleset.note: UPLIFT-V NOTES: Frameset created by Jena. (from uplift.01-v)

example.name: uplifted-j
example.text: The disaster has hit the uplifted coral.

example.name: uplift-v: both args
example.text: The wind uplifted some strands of gray hair not covered by his Indians cap
example.arg: some strands of gray hair not covered by his Indians cap

example.name: uplifting-j
example.text: It is not very uplifting to the mind on a beautiful Sunday evening to meet scores of linked-together men and maidens shrieking and yelling, perhaps not many yards from the little village church whose bell rings out with a clang of despair.
example.arg: to meet scores of linked-together men and maidens shrieking and yelling, perhaps not many yards from the little village church whose bell rings out with a clang of despair
